程序包 org.bukkit.block

package org.bukkit.block
用于操作在世界内的三位像素(方块)，包括一些特定的状态.
  • 相关程序包
    程序包
    说明
    org.bukkit
    Bukkit的常用类.

    说明
    Banner
    代表旗帜(快照)/Represents a captured state of a banner.
    Beacon
    Represents a captured state of a beacon.
    Bed
    代表床(快照)/Represents a captured state of a bed.
    Biome
    所有生物群系的枚举.
    Block
    代表方块.
    BlockFace
    代表方块的朝向.
    BlockState
    Represents a captured state of a block, which will not change automatically.
    BrewingStand
    代表酿造台(快照).
    Chest
    代表一个箱子(快照).

    代表命令方块(快照)/Represents a captured state of a command block.

    Represents a captured state of an on / off comparator.

    Represents a captured state of a container block.
    CreatureSpawner
    代表一个刷怪笼(快照).

    Represents a captured state of a (possibly inverted) daylight detector.

    代表一个发射器(快照).

    代表一个大型箱子.

    代表一个投掷器(快照).

    Represents a captured state of an end gateway.
    FlowerPot
    Represents a captured state of a flower pot.
    Furnace
    代表一个熔炉(快照).
    Hopper
    代表漏斗(快照).
    Jukebox
    代表一个唱片机(快照).
    Lockable
    Represents a block (usually a container) that may be locked.
    NoteBlock
    代表音符盒(快照).
    PistonMoveReaction
    Represents how a block or entity will react when interacting with a piston when it is extending or retracting.
    ShulkerBox
    Represents a captured state of a ShulkerBox.
    Sign
    代表一个告示牌或者墙上告示牌(快照).
    Skull
    代表一个头颅(快照).
    Structure
    Represents a structure block that can save and load blocks from a file.
